Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: The trees themselves beckon you - or is that a trick of the light?

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Uh, wait-

Children.Title: Cabin
Children.Tooltip: Step inside Rux's cabin.

ScriptAppear.Script:
-- Can only enter after Jar'la is visited
return Storage.GetNumber("MQ04") >= 3
    or Player:HasItem("I_MQ04_AlchSupplies")

Children.Title: Chip
Children.Tooltip: The giant wolf is sleeping just beside the trees.

Children.Title: Injuries
Children.Tooltip: Ask about Iso's health.

Children.Title: Randall
Children.Tooltip: Ask if anyone was following her.

Children.Title: Adept
Children.Tooltip: Ask if he is indeed capable of tapping into amber.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("MQ04_ADEPT_BEDSIDE_END04")
-- Remove the ring
if Player.EquippedAccessory1 ~= nil and Player.EquippedAccessory1.AssetName == "AC_IsoRing2" then
    Player.EquippedAccessory1 = nil
elseif Player.EquippedAccessory2 ~= nil and Player.EquippedAccessory2.AssetName == "AC_IsoRing2" then
    Player.EquippedAccessory2 = nil
else
    Player:TakeItem("AC_IsoRing2")
end

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Time to go.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Time to go.

Children.Title: Uh, sure...
Children.Tooltip: Not like he's dead or anything...

Children.Title: Red Maw
Children.Tooltip: Ask if he knows what the Red Maw is.

Children.Title: Chip
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the giant guard wolf.

Children.Title: Shore
Children.Tooltip: Ask what he knows about this magical Shore you've heard about.

Nodes.Comment: Log message already shown by 'Entry_C_Cabin' node

Children.Title: Yes
Children.Tooltip: Sure thing.

Children.Title: Gentle
Children.Tooltip: Say that she did not make it out, so that we could.

Children.Title: Confirm
Children.Tooltip: No point in obfuscating the truth.

Children.Title: Neutral
Children.Tooltip: Say that Randall swallowed her.

Children.Title: Snarky
Children.Tooltip: Say that she's well on her way sloshing through wolf intestines by now.

Children.Title: No
Children.Tooltip: Politely decline.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Return to the wilderness beyond the doorway.

Children.Title: Rest
Children.Tooltip: Sit by the fire a moment and record your progress.

Children.Title: Trade
Children.Tooltip: Ask Rux if he has any supplies to spare.

Children.Title: Book
Children.Tooltip: Give the untranslated book you found to Rux.

Children.Title: Explain
Children.Tooltip: Explain where you found the book.

Children.Title: Iso's Home
Children.Tooltip: Tell Iso you want to pick up the lead that she mentioned, at her home.

Children.Title: Plan Next Steps
Children.Tooltip: It's time to put together all your findings with your co-conspirators.

Children.Title: Visit Iso's Home
Children.Tooltip: She's right, this lead has to be taken care of now or never.

Children.Title: No need
Children.Tooltip: It'll take time you don't have, and there's probably nothing to be found anyway.

Children.Title: Location
Children.Tooltip: Describe the maps and location info you found.

Children.Title: Goal
Children.Tooltip: Describe Randall's ultimate goal, as far as you gathered.

Children.Title: Amber
Children.Tooltip: Confirm that the Red Maw is indeed an untapped amber mine.

Children.Title: Journals
Children.Tooltip: You discovered the cruel fate of the original proprietors.

Children.Title: Red Maw
Children.Tooltip: You know the exact size of the opposition.

Children.Title: Zosk
Children.Tooltip: You discovered Zosk's role in this story.

Children.Title: Done
Children.Tooltip: You have nothing else to add.

Children.Title: Ready
Children.Tooltip: You can leave now.

Children.Title: Not ready
Children.Tooltip: You need to take care of a few things first.

Children.Title: Ready to Leave
Children.Tooltip: You're ready to depart for Dalsida Abbey.

Children.Title: Sell Amber
Children.Tooltip: You've found amber on your travels; maybe Rux is interested in it.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("MQ04_ADEPT_SELLAMBER")

local num_amber1, num_amber2 = 0, 0
while Player:TakeItem("I_Amber01") do num_amber1 = num_amber1 + 1 end
while Player:TakeItem("I_Amber02") do num_amber2 = num_amber2 + 1 end

Storage.ModifyNumber("RUX_AMBER_SOLD_1", num_amber1)
Storage.ModifyNumber("RUX_AMBER_SOLD_2", num_amber2)

Player:ModifyMoney((num_amber1 * 20) + (num_amber2 * 35))

Children.Title: Done
Children.Tooltip: No more questions for now.

Children.Title: Confident
Children.Tooltip: You'll get it done quickly and quietly.

Children.Title: Done
Children.Tooltip: You have your mission, and they have theirs.

Children.Title: Pessimistic
Children.Tooltip: They had better think of a backup plan.

Children.Title: Vengeful
Children.Tooltip: You're done running.

Children.Title: Adept
Children.Tooltip: Ask if he is an Adept, and what that title even means.

Children.Title: Amber
Children.Tooltip: Ask what the amber crystals are, and why they are so important.

Children.Title: Purpose
Children.Tooltip: Ask what he uses it for.

Children.Title: History
Children.Tooltip: Ask how he came to choose this field of study.

Children.Title: Shore
Children.Tooltip: Ask him for his take on the mystical Shore that Willow mentioned.

Children.Title: Spirits
Children.Tooltip: Ask him what he thinks about the spirits that some hold sacred.

Children.Title: Guard Wolf
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the giant wolf you met outside.

Children.Title: Arm
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the amber crystal fused with his flesh.

Children.Title: Werewolf
Children.Tooltip: Ask what he thinks about the transformation Randall performed.

Children.Title: Rift
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the strange rift you left behind at Dalsida Abbey.

Children.Title: Bridge Incident
Children.Tooltip: Ask her to recap the whole story.

Children.Title: And then?
Children.Tooltip: Continue the story.

Children.Title: Drastic Measures
Children.Tooltip: Ask if this decision wasn't a bit excessive.

Children.Title: Your Involvement
Children.Tooltip: Ask how she'd convinced you to take part in all this.

Children.Title: Willow
Children.Tooltip: Ask her if she's doing alright after the other night.

Children.Title: Randall
Children.Tooltip: Ask her how she relates to the wolf, exactly.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Let sleeping dogs lie.

Children.Title: Tail Scritches!
Children.Tooltip: Butt scritches, just at the base of the spine! Irresistible!

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("MQ04_CHIP_AV01")
Log(IsChipVoreFatal() and "MQ04_CHIP_NOTE_FATAL" or "MQ04_CHIP_NOTE_ENDO")
PreySense(Creature("CR_MQ04_Chip"), EPreySenseType.AnalVore,
    IsChipVoreFatal() and EPreySenseType.DigestionFatal or EPreySenseType.Endo)

Children.Title: Touch
Children.Tooltip: Can't let such a sexy butt go unexplored.

ScriptAction.Script:
if Player.IsExplicitDisposalEnabled then
    Log("MQ04_CHIP_AV02")
else
    Log("MQ04_CHIP_AV02_CLEAN")
end

if Player.IsExplicitDisposalEnabled then
    Log("MQ04_CHIP_AV03")
else
    Log("MQ04_CHIP_AV03_CLEAN")
end

if Player.IsExplicitDisposalEnabled then
    Log("MQ04_CHIP_AV04")
else
    Log("MQ04_CHIP_AV04_CLEAN")
end

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Yup, you're wolf food now.

ScriptAction.Script:
local fight = Combat2()
local good_boye = Creature("CR_MQ04_Chip")
fight:AddParticipant(Player)
fight:AddParticipant(good_boye)
fight:SetVored(good_boye, Player)
fight:Begin()

Storage.SetFlag("FOREST_DIREWOLF_FRIENDLY", true)
local fight = Combat2()
local good_boye = Creature("CR_MQ04_Chip")
good_boye.PredatorDigests = false
fight:AddParticipant(Player)
fight:AddParticipant(good_boye)
fight:SetVored(good_boye, Player)
fight:OnRoundEnd(function(round)
    Log("MQ04_CHIP_ENDO" .. tostring(round))
    AdvanceTime(2)
    if round >= 3 then fight:End() end
end)
fight:Begin()

Children.Title: Bellyrubs!
Children.Tooltip: Who's a good boy? Who's a good boy?

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("MQ04_CHIP_OV01")
Log(IsChipVoreFatal() and "MQ04_CHIP_NOTE_FATAL" or "MQ04_CHIP_NOTE_ENDO")
PreySense(Creature("CR_MQ04_Chip"), EPreySenseType.OralVore,
    IsChipVoreFatal() and EPreySenseType.DigestionFatal or EPreySenseType.Endo)

Children.Title: Knead away
Children.Tooltip: That soft, fuzzy belly looks like it could use a good massage.
